meanings.definition: The act of striking a bell or gong to produce a ringing sound.
meanings.sent1: The bonging of the church bell signaled the start of the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The deep bonging of the gong echoed through the temple.
meanings.sent3: The rhythmic bonging of the bell made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The bonging of the gong seemed to awaken ancient spirits.
meanings.sent5: The loud bonging of the bell could be heard from miles away.

meanings.definition: The sound produced by striking a bell or gong.
meanings.sent1: The peaceful bonging of the wind chime filled the garden.
meanings.sent2: The distant bonging of the church bell carried through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected bonging of the doorbell made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The constant bonging of the alarm clock finally woke him up.
meanings.sent5: The soothing bonging of the grandfather clock marked each hour.

meanings.definition: To strike a bell or gong to produce a ringing sound.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys bonging the gong during meditation sessions.
meanings.sent2: The tradition involves bonging the bell three times for good luck.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally bonged the bell too loudly, startling the birds.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic bonging of the gong set the pace for the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The old man's hands trembled as he tried bonging the bell gently.
